column3: Concept ACK, but wouldn't it be better to add this to the 0.13.1 release notes (on the 0.13 branch)? I'm fairly sure no one will read updated 0.13.0 release notes right now anymore. Publishing this result of the 0.13.0 experiment with ARM executables in 0.13.1, however, would be useful.\n

Or both. However, you want to do it. I've got a slightly different commit for the 0.13.1 notes over in my repo. Let me know how you want to handle it. Here's the 0.13.1 version diff:\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/compare/0.13...mruddy:relnote131\n
Yes, both is fine too! Willl need a separate pull for 0.13 though.\nText looks good to me.\n
